item.description:
@alangblake @joshtpm First, reported income over 500k doesn‚Äôt include the people earning 500k but reporting 200k ‚Äî committing $100k fraud. Each year. So well more than $150k for a multi year audit.

@alangblake @joshtpm Second,are you against all law enforcement, or only those who might catch rich people?

item.description: @alangblake @joshtpm You‚Äôre saying an IRS agent can‚Äôt find $150k/year if unleashed? Surely you‚Äôre joking. And at odds with all that is known and suspected about tax fraud.

item.description: @delong @CaraGuha @Popehat Since part of his job is not saying the quiet part aloud, it would seem to be defamatory. Absent the tweet being rebroadcast to a bigger audience, it‚Äôs hard to imagine any actual damages. (And that‚Äôs putting aside the satirical commentary defense.)

item.description:
It would have been more honest to also note the role of Republican Senator Rand Paul in blocking quick Senate approval of the funding. https://t.co/AO05hcXMDr

You‚Äôd think the Paul family would be on the radar of an ostensible antisemitism fighting group, given that a New Jersey kid returned from volunteering on Ron Paul‚Äôs 2012 New Hampshire campaign a determined antisemite and went on to orchestrate attacks on local synagogues.
